answers.author: Ann Mahoney
answers.text:
ICMA published a book called ELECTRONIC RECORDS MANAGEMENT that might provide some of the info you need. It does not include a sample RFP but does describe the sections that are typically included. Here is a link to the bookstore description,  which also lets you read all of the first chapter:  http://bookstore.icma.org/Electronic_Records_Management_P1633C12.cfm
Hope this is helpful!
Ann Mahoney, Director, ICMA Publications

author: April Getchius
text:
Hi, all.  We need to move toward electronic record keeping for our files.  I am looking for any advice, sample RFP to get services and any other information that would be helpful.  Ideas?

Timnath, Colorado
